Reference

mapboxer Instance

mapboxerOutput() renderMapboxer()

Shiny bindings for mapboxer

mapboxer()

Create a mapboxer widget

Sources

add_source()

Add a data source to the map

as_mapbox_source()

Convert a data object to a Mapbox geojson source

mapbox_source()

Create a Mapbox data source

Layers

add_circle_layer()

Add a circle layer to the map

add_fill_layer()

Add a fill layer to the map

add_layer()

Add a layer to the map

add_line_layer()

Add a line layer to the map

add_popup()

Add popups for a given layer to the map

Styles

set_map_style()

Set the style of the map

use_background_style()

Use a single color as map style

use_carto_style()

Use a Carto map style

use_raster_style()

Use raster tiles as map style

use_stamen_raster_style()

Use stamen raster tiles as map style

get_osm_raster_tiles()

Get osm raster tile urls

Controls

add_control() add_navigation_control() add_scale_control() add_fullscreen_control()

Add a control to the map

Misc

set_view_state()

Set the view state of the map
